channel.title: Video Suggestions - HYDRANS
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
I have been thinking about starting up a YouTube Channel for my songs, as well as music-related videos and tutorials. I already have a video in the making, but I was wondering what the community would want to see.
Some ideas I had were ~ Track Deconstructions of my popular songs (let me know which ones you would want to see) ~ Demonstrations on how to make certain styles ~ Creating a song from scratch ~ Showing how to make certain drumkits or sounds ~ Q&A through Discord
If you have other ideas, let me know, and if you like any of the ideas up here, let me know as well so I can follow up with a video!
[My SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/hydrans)
Thanks! ~ HYDRANS

item.title: Video Suggestions - HYDRANS
item.dc:creator: HYDRANS
item.description:
Hello everyone!

I have been thinking about starting up a YouTube Channel for my songs, as well as music-related videos and tutorials. I already have a video in the making, but I was wondering what the community would want to see.

Some ideas I had were
~ Track Deconstructions of my popular songs (let me know which ones you would want to see)
~ Demonstrations on how to make certain styles
~ Creating a song from scratch
~ Showing how to make certain drumkits or sounds
~ Q&A through Discord

If you have other ideas, let me know, and if you like any of the ideas up here, let me know as well so I can follow up with a video!

My SoundCloud

Thanks!
~ HYDRANS
